Me faltan amigos para terminar todos los logros

This is a first-person game in which you create two portals. Going through one leads you out the other. You must then solve environmental puzzles by strategically placing these two portals. Since this could be considered a dull gameplay loop, a psychotic english robot will be present, primarily to antagonize you. Since that could be considered quite daunting, you will also be furnished with a talking potato. She struggles with empathy, but she's quite nice once you get to know her. 

The puzzles are brilliant in this one, so so creative. The graphics and environmental story telling are top-notch. 

I've never been a fan of the music in Portal, it's very synth-wavey and can get quite intrusive. But the sound effects are all very well done.

This is one of the most creative video games i've ever played. Recommended, ten out of ten cakes.
A perfect game to chill out and play through on your own or to play with friends and never talk to them again.
It's portal 2, who wouldn't wanna play it?

The crown jewel of valvE , want to experience this game again for the first time . from the opening to the end  this game blew me away from its gameplay , the creative direction . i felt the loneliness of source engine. the part where we've have to navigate through the ruin of old  aperture lab is the best part , gladOS great as always but wheatly stole the show. the end is just perfect the turret opera  to the big panther skin and the credit song .
it has the same weird holes from the first game (idk what they are called) but now i can shoot cum from them. nice improvement.
Better than the first game in every way, and one of my favourite games ever 10/10
Me quede con cara cuadrada al jugar esto (lo digo de buena manera), la historia es una pasada de otro mundo, para ser un juego del 2011 se ve como un juego de 2017. Recomiendo al 100% este juegaso
Bastante intuitivo, entretenido, te hace pensar bastante y la historia se desarrolla bastante bien
Sequel of a classic. One of the best single players out there!

Amazing game, fiendishly hard puzzles and great co-op mode.

Still remains one of the best games I've ever played. The story and the voice acting is absolutely spectacular and unique. I found myself laughing out loud through out the dialogue and the game play is fun and engaging.

I love this game. One of my top 5 ever. the story is long and fun, good, challenging tests, and when your all done with that, you can try to beat your best time in challenge mode. When your done with THAT, you can play community tests. WHEN YOUR DONE WITH THAT, you can do it with a friend. best game ever.

Probably the greatest game I"ve played on steam for the past 8 years. 

I have never played a game before in my life with puzzles greater than this. The dialouge is pure comedy, I like how there isnt a lot for characters in the game which makes them feel more real and funny. 

Belive me, you"ll see what I mean when you try it out
